# Welcome {.unnumbered}

**R & GIS for Geoinformatics** is a 12-week, hands-on course that pairs **RStudio** scripting with **QGIS** cartography.

| Detail | Info |
|-------|------|
| **Schedule** | Mondays 14:00 - 15:30 Lab 1014/B |
| **Prerequisites** | None – no prior coding or GIS experience |
| **Software** | R ≥ 4.3 · RStudio Desktop · QGIS 3.34 LTR (all free) |

## Learning path
1. **Foundations** – R syntax, tidy data, CRS basics  
2. **Vector Spatial Analysis** – joins, buffers, networks, ESDA  
3. **Workflow & Communication** – R ↔ QGIS hand-off, automation, web maps  

## Assessment

| Item | Week | Weight |
|------|------|-------|
| Assignment 1 · Data wrangling + map/plot | 7 | 15 % |
| Assignment 2 · Mini spatial model | 10 | 25 % |
| **Final project** · End-to-end case study | Exam week | 60 % |


## First-week checklist
- Install R, RStudio, QGIS  
- Syntax & simple coding

Questions? Post in **#Forum** on Digicampus.
